description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5mckj","text":"This protocol describes coupling of   of rabbit monoclonal TMEM192 antibody (Abcam recombinant Anti-TMEM192 antibody [EPR14330-67], BSA and Azide free, ab232600) to   of MyOne™ Epoxy Dynabeads™ (Invitrogen™, 34001D) to obtain   of final suspension. The coupled beads generated using this protocol can be used for the isolation of untagged lysosomes from cells and tissues.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":165,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":226,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9rerb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"538kp","text":"™","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mcft","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4g0q4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":173},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":343},{"key":2,"length":1,"offset":345}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"aemmt","text":"This protocol can be used for coupling of any monoclonal antibody to MyOne™ Epoxy Dynabeads. Antibody to be coupled should be provided in PBS at a concentration of at least  , and must be free of sodium azide, amine-based buffers, glycerol and protein stabilisers (BSA). Maximum binding capacity of MyOne™ Epoxy Dynabeads™ is estimated to be ~ -  of antibody per mg of beads. In this protocol 30 μg per mg of beads is used, to ensure complete saturation of beads.","type":"align-left"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"15nm8","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"1.2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3166},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"},"1":{"data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"},"2":{"data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"}}}}}}
